trans-unit.source: Specifies the rows or columns that are resized by a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 行またはによってサイズが変更される列を指定します、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>コントロール。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: この列挙体は<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>プロパティ</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>の値を設定するために使用します。

trans-unit.source: Space is redistributed based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment*> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment*> properties.
trans-unit.target: 値に基づく領域が再配布、 <> </> *> と<> *> プロパティです。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property specifies that space is redistributed between rows, the redistribution follows these guidelines: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the row that is above that row.
trans-unit.target: 場合の値、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>プロパティは、領域は行の間、再配布が次のガイドラインを次のことを指定します - ときに、<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>プロパティがに設定されている<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>、領域が指定されている行の間で再配布、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>し、その行の上にある行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> 。

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the row that is below that row.
trans-unit.target: -、<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>プロパティに設定されている<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>、領域は、行に対して指定されている間、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>し、その行の下にある行</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter></xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>。

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>, space is redistributed between the row that is above and the row that is below the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>プロパティが<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>、領域は、行の上であると<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>に指定されている行の下である行の間</xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>に設定</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>する

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between the row that is above and the row that is below the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>プロパティが<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>、領域は、行の上であると<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>に指定されている行の下である行の間</xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>に設定</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>する

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property specifies that space is redistributed between columns, the redistribution follows these guidelines: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the column that is to the left.
trans-unit.target: 場合の値、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>プロパティを指定しない列の間で領域は再配布がこのガイドラインに従って::、<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>プロパティに設定されている<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>、領域は、列に対して指定されている間、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>および左側にある列</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter></xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>。

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the column that is to the right.
trans-unit.target: 場合、<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>プロパティに設定されている<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>、領域は、列に対して指定されている間、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>と右側にある列です</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter></xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>。

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>に指定されている列の右側および左側にある列の間で領域は</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>、プロパティを設定</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>する

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>に指定されている列の右側および左側にある列の間で領域は</xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>、プロパティを設定</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>する

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next row that is below it.
trans-unit.target: 水平方向の<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>、領域は、行に対して指定されている間、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>とその下にある次の行。

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next column that is to the right.
trans-unit.target: 垂直方向の<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>、領域は、列に対して指定されている間、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>と右側には、次の列です。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next row that is above it.
trans-unit.target: 水平方向の<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>、領域は、行に対して指定されている間、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>とその上には、次の行。

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next column that is to the left.
trans-unit.target: 垂直方向の<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>、領域は、列に対して指定されている間、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>および左側には、次の列です。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the rows that are above and below the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 水平方向の<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>、領域は指定されている行の下で、上の行の間、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 垂直方向の<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>、領域が指定されている列の右側および左側にある列の間で再配布、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>します。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。
